title: Cocoa-flavanols enhance moderate-intensity pulmonaryV˙O2kinetics but not exercise tolerance in sedentary middle-aged adults.
abstract: Cocoa flavanols (CF) may exert health benefits through their potent vasodilatory effects, which are perpetuated by elevations in nitric oxide (NO) bioavailability. These vasodilatory effects may contribute to improved delivery of blood and oxygen (O2) to exercising muscle.
